attributes.action: Bring All of the Troops in Iraq out
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please bring the troops out of Iraq. everyday soldiers are dying. My family have suffered losses so to have many other people. I hope you take on board my advice.

rejection.details:
There is already a petition dealing with this issue:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/IraqAfghanWar

If you would like to write to the Prime Minister directly, contact details can be found here:
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page3.asp
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
